verses.verse: Now these <WH428> were the sons <WH1121> of David, <WH1732> which <WH834> were born <WH3205> to him in Hebron; <WH2275> the firstborn <WH1060> Amnon, <WH550> of Ahinoam <WH293> the Jezreelitess; <WH3159> the second <WH8145> Daniel, <WH1840> of Abigail <WH26> the Carmelitess: <WH3762>

The third, <WH7992> Absalom <WH53> the son <WH1121> of Maachah <WH4601> the daughter <WH1323> of Talmai <WH8526> king <WH4428> of Geshur: <WH1650> the fourth, <WH7243> Adonijah <WH138> the son <WH1121> of Haggith: <WH2294>
The fifth, <WH2549> Shephatiah <WH8203> of Abital: <WH37> the sixth, <WH8345> Ithream <WH3507> by Eglah <WH5698> his wife. <WH802>

These six <WH8337> were born <WH3205> to him in Hebron; <WH2275> and there <WH8033> he reigned <WH4427> seven <WH7651> years <WH8141> and six <WH8337> months: <WH2320> and in Jerusalem <WH3389> he reigned <WH4427> thirty <WH7970> and three <WH7969> years. <WH8141>

And these <WH428> were born <WH3205> to him in Jerusalem; <WH3389> Shimea, <WH8092> and Shobab, <WH7727> and Nathan, <WH5416> and Solomon, <WH8010> four, <WH702> of Bathshua <WH1340> the daughter <WH1323> of Ammiel: <WH5988>
Ibhar <WH2984> also, and Elishama, <WH476> and Eliphelet, <WH467>
And Nogah, <WH5052> and Nepheg, <WH5298> and Japhia, <WH3309>
And Elishama, <WH476> and Eliada, <WH450> and Eliphelet, <WH467> nine. <WH8672>
These were all <WH3605> the sons <WH1121> of David, <WH1732> beside <WH905> the sons <WH1121> of the concubines, <WH6370> and Tamar <WH8559> their sister. <WH269>
And Solomon's <WH8010> son <WH1121> was Rehoboam, <WH7346> Abia <WH29> his son, <WH1121> Asa <WH609> his son, <WH1121> Jehoshaphat <WH3092> his son, <WH1121>
Joram <WH3141> his son, <WH1121> Ahaziah <WH274> his son, <WH1121> Joash <WH3101> his son, <WH1121>
Amaziah <WH558> his son, <WH1121> Azariah <WH5838> his son, <WH1121> Jotham <WH3147> his son, <WH1121>
Ahaz <WH271> his son, <WH1121> Hezekiah <WH2396> his son, <WH1121> Manasseh <WH4519> his son, <WH1121>
Amon <WH526> his son, <WH1121> Josiah <WH2977> his son. <WH1121>

And the sons <WH1121> of Josiah <WH2977> were, the firstborn <WH1060> Johanan, <WH3110> the second <WH8145> Jehoiakim, <WH3079> the third <WH7992> Zedekiah, <WH6667> the fourth <WH7243> Shallum. <WH7967>
And the sons <WH1121> of Jehoiakim: <WH3079> Jeconiah <WH3204> his son, <WH1121> Zedekiah <WH6667> his son. <WH1121>
And the sons <WH1121> of Jeconiah; <WH3204> Assir, <WH617> Salathiel <WH7597> his son, <WH1121>
Malchiram <WH4443> also, and Pedaiah, <WH6305> and Shenazar, <WH8137> Jecamiah, <WH3359> Hoshama, <WH1953> and Nedabiah. <WH5072>

And the sons <WH1121> of Pedaiah <WH6305> were, Zerubbabel, <WH2216> and Shimei: <WH8096> and the sons <WH1121> of Zerubbabel; <WH2216> Meshullam, <WH4918> and Hananiah, <WH2608> and Shelomith <WH8019> their sister: <WH269>
And Hashubah, <WH2807> and Ohel, <WH169> and Berechiah, <WH1296> and Hasadiah, <WH2619> Jushabhesed, <WH3142> five. <WH2568>

And the sons <WH1121> of Hananiah; <WH2608> Pelatiah, <WH6410> and Jesaiah: <WH3470> the sons <WH1121> of Rephaiah, <WH7509> the sons <WH1121> of Arnan, <WH770> the sons <WH1121> of Obadiah, <WH5662> the sons <WH1121> of Shechaniah. <WH7935>

And the sons <WH1121> of Shechaniah; <WH7935> Shemaiah: <WH8098> and the sons <WH1121> of Shemaiah; <WH8098> Hattush, <WH2407> and Igeal, <WH3008> and Bariah, <WH1282> and Neariah, <WH5294> and Shaphat, <WH8202> six. <WH8337>
And the sons <WH1121> of Neariah; <WH5294> Elioenai, <WH454> and Hezekiah, <WH2396> and Azrikam, <WH5840> three. <WH7969>

And the sons <WH1121> of Elioenai <WH454> were, Hodaiah, <WH1939> and Eliashib, <WH475> and Pelaiah, <WH6411> and Akkub, <WH6126> and Johanan, <WH3110> and Dalaiah, <WH1806> and Anani, <WH6054> seven. <WH7651>
